    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_375</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_375</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Derivadas laterales</string>
            <string language="en">One-sided derivative</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einseitige Ableitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dérivé recto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Derivative simples</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Derivato su un solo lato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μονόπλευρο παράγωγο</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de derivada. Se estudia su definición, la tasa de variación media y su relación con el concepto de continuidad.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses visuals to introduce the concept of derivative. It studies its definition, the mean rate of variation and its relation to the concept of continuity.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">pendiente</string>
            <string language="en">slope</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">tasa de variación media</string>
            <string language="en">mean rate of variation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">derivada</string>
            <string language="en">derivative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">continuidad</string>
            <string language="en">continuity</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Sichtbarmachungen, das Konzept der Ableitung vorzustellen. Sie 
studiert seine Definition, den Mittelkurs der Variante und seine 
Relation zum Konzept des Durchganges.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
visuels de présenter le concept du dérivé. Il étudie sa 
définition, la cadence moyenne de la variation et sa relation au 
concept de la continuité.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos visuals introduzir o 
conceito do derivative. Estuda sua definição, a taxa média da
variação e sua relação ao conceito da continuidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi rappresentazioni 
introdurre il concetto del derivato. Studia la relativa 
definizione, il tasso medio di variazione ed il relativo rapporto con 
concetto di continuità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τα visuals για 
να εισαγάγει την έννοια του παραγώγου. Μελετά τον καθορισμό
του, το μέσο ποσοστό παραλλαγής και σχέσης του με την έννοια της 
συνοχής.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Steigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mittelkurs der Variante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ableitung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Durchgang</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cadence moyenne de variation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dérivé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fonction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">continuité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inclinação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">taxa média da variação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">derivative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">função</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">continuidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pendio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tasso medio di variazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">derivato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">funzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">continuità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κλίση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σημάνετε το ποσοστό παραλλαγής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παράγωγο</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-el">λειτουργία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
